data.text: Yaye Jehova Nyasaye en Nyasaye ma jachul kuor,
Aa malo, yaye Jangʼad bura mar piny;
Yaye Jehova Nyasaye, nyaka karangʼo ma joma timbegi richo,
Gidiro weche mag wich teko;
Gikidho jogi, yaye Jehova Nyasaye;
Ginego dhako ma chwore otho gi jadak;
Giwacho niya, “Jehova Nyasaye ok ne;
To winjuru, un joma omingʼ e dier ji;
Donge ngʼama nochomo it winjo wach?
Donge ngʼat marieyo ogendini kumo ji?
Jehova Nyasaye ongʼeyo pach dhano;
Ogwedh ngʼat mikumo, yaye Jehova Nyasaye,
imiyo ngʼama kamano resruok e ndalo chandruok,
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye ok bi dagi joge;
Yor adiera biro yudore kendo ne joma kare,
En ngʼa mabiro radona gi joma timbegi richo?
Ka dine Jehova Nyasaye ok omiya kony,
Kane awacho niya, “Tienda kier,”
Ka achiedh-nade nopongʼo chunya,
Loch marach bende inyalo riworigo adier,
Ginywako ne joma kare
To Jehova Nyasaye osebedo ohingana,
Obiro chulogi nikech richogi
